problems.description: You are given the list of edges of a directed Binary search tree and the root node along with a target node. . Find if the target node exists in the tree.
problems.inputs description: Input consists of an array of edges -inp1 as [node1, node2]. The other input is the root node - inp2 and the target node - inp3
problems.expected description: An array of nodes in the correct order of visitation
